NGINX_PLUS_REQUESTS_PER_CONNECTION.description: Requests per handled connections for Nginx

NGINX_PLUS_UPTIME.description: The amount of time the Nginx server has been running

NGINX_PLUS_WAITING.description: Keep-alive connections with Nginx Plus in a wait state

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_COLD.description: Indicator of whether the 'cache loader' process is still loading data from disk into the cache

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_SIZE.description: The current size of the cache

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_USED.description: The percent of the cache currently in use

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_SERVED.description: The total number of bytes read from the cache

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_BYPASSED.description: The total number of bytes read from the proxied server

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_WRITTEN.description: The total number of bytes written to the cache

NGINX_PLUS_CACHE_HIT_PERCENT.description: The percentage that the cache was used to handle requests

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_CURRENT_CONNECTIONS.description: The number of currently active connections in the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_REQUESTS.description: The number of requests per second being handled in the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_1XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 100 reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_2XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 200 reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_3XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 300 reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_4XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 400 reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_5XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 500 reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_TOTAL_RESPONSES.description: The total number of reponses per second being sent from the zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_TRAFFIC_SENT.description: The byte per second being sent from this server zone

NGINX_PLUS_ZONE_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.description: The byte per second being received by this server zone

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_STATE.description: The current state of the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_REQUESTS.description: The number of requests per second being handled for the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_1XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 100 reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_2XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 200 reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_3XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 300 reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_4XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 400 reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_5XX_RESPONSES.description: The number of 500 reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TOTAL_RESPONSES.description: The total number of reponses per second being sent by the upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TOTAL_RESPONSES.displayName: Nginx Plus Upstream Server Total Response/Sec

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_ACTIVE_CONNECTIONS.description: The number of currently active connections to the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_PERC_USED_CONNECTION.description: The percentage connections in use to the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_SENT.description: The byte per second being sent to this upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_SENT.displayName: Nginx Plus Upstream Server Traffic Sent

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.description: The byte per second being received from this upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.displayName: Nginx Plus Upstream Server Traffic Received

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_FAILED_CHECKS.description: The number of times the server check failed to the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_DOWNTIME.description: The total downtime of the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_PERC_FAILED.description: The percentage of failed health checks of the upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_PERC_FAILED.displayName: Nginx Plus Upstream % Failed Health Checks

NGINX_PLUS_UPSTREAM_HEALTHY.description: The last health status of the upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_CURRENT_CONNECTIONS.description: The number of currently active connections in the TCP zone
NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_CURRENT_CONNECTIONS.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Zone Active Conns

NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_CONNECTIONS.description: The connections per second to the TCP zone

NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_TRAFFIC_SENT.description: The byte per second being sent from this TCP zone
NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_TRAFFIC_SENT.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Zone Server Traffic Sent

NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.description: The byte per second being received to this TCP Zone
NGINX_PLUS_TCPZONE_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Zone Server Traffic Received

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_STATE.description: The status of the TCP upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_CONNECTIONS.description: The number of client connections forwarded to the TCP upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION.description: The number of currently active connections to the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Active Conns

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_PERC_USED_CONNECT.description: The percentage connections in use to the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_PERC_USED_CONNECT.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream % Used Conns

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_SENT.description: The byte per second being sent to this TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_SENT.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Server Traffic Sent

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.description: The byte per second being received from this TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_TRAFFIC_RECEIVED.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Server Traffic Received

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_FAILED_CHECKS.description: The number of times the server check failed to the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_FAILED_CHECKS.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Failed Checks

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_DOWNTIME.description: The total downtime of the TCP upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_PERC_FAILED.description: The percentage of failed health checks of the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_PERC_FAILED.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream % Failed Health Checks

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_HEALTHY.description: The last health status of the TCP upstream server groups

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_CONNECT_TIME.description: The average time to connect to the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_CONNECT_TIME.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Connect Time

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_FIRST_BYTE_TIME.description: The average time to receive the first byte of data from the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_FIRST_BYTE_TIME.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream First Byte Time

NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_RESPONSE_TIME.description: The average time to receive the last byte of data from the TCP upstream server groups
NGINX_PLUS_TCPUPSTREAM_RESPONSE_TIME.displayName: Nginx Plus TCP Upstream Response Time
